plot: A family of boisterous children expect their Father to organise a really exciting holiday. So when the chance comes up of spending it on a boat, the Ramona, it seems that the problem is solved.
title: Szeleburdi vakáció
plot_es: A family of boisterous children expect their Father to organise a really exciting holiday. So when the chance comes up of spending it on a boat, the Ramona, it seems that the problem is solved.
